body: Cant read shit but I like it
From level 35 hero to level 200 succubus. Overall profit.
Shit, nothing gets me harder than RPG stat blocks going up really quickly.

This author draw almost everything I've wanted:
- Succubus+Twintails - My favourite race & hairstyle design.
- Gender bender - Turn guy into succubus look so arousing.
- Turn into succubus & happy with it drown to pleasure.
- Heart pupil - This author express it well that how MC's happy with it as I wanted.
I'm jealous this MC he so happy & have fun all over himself. But I'm afraid someday readers might mistook my MC complain me for copy "twintails succubus gender bender" character design because this author have same taste of hair & heart pupil happy expression design as I do excepts clothes design & story plots.
my first thought as well. I'm guessing people wanted the sequel that never came, a similar work was done by another artist instead, knowing there was a demand for this
